feed.title: App Store Discounts（TW）
feed.subtitle: App Store Discounts - Made with love by appstore-discounts(https://github.com/appstore-discounts/appstore-discounts) feedId:73536236398899200+userId:73658201673997312 feedId:157008546980077568+userId:73658201673997312

entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: Knight & Dragon III
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$120.00 → $60.00 [$60.00 ~ $120.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$60.00

应用描述

稀有物品！ 轉職！ 以及宏大的故事。 極致成就要素滿滿的正統砍殺類RPG遊戲“Knight & Dragon”第三彈！ 《Knight & Dragon III》是基於中世紀奇幻世界觀構建的砍殺類RPG遊戲的第三彈。 故事始於某天早晨，你從突然到訪的老紳士那裏收到了正式公會成員證書，前往格林加爾德共和國的小村莊赴任。 共和國中發生的各種事件、與鄰國林達爾帝國的紛爭、騎士與龍的故事，最終都將成為圍繞星辰的宏大命運旋渦，將你卷入其中。 【Knight & Dragon III的特點】 ▽沿襲前作的極致成就型RPG的基本係統，如白熱化的實時戰鬥、稀有物品掉落和轉職等！ ▽實時戰鬥的互動性更強，可以判斷對手的攻擊時機，進行閃避、格擋、反擊等！ ▽新增了豐富的武器類物品，如斧頭、長槍、戟等！ 還可以創建自己喜歡的角色，如雙手持武器或二刀流等！ ▽新增的世界地圖為宏大的故事增添色彩！ 故事篇幅超越前作，同時保留了通關後內容！ ▽此外，在本作中，通過各具特點的豐富NPC登場，以及地名、街市名稱等專有名詞，描繪了宏大的故事！ ▽另外，遊戲當然也延續了前作中備受好評的功能，如隊伍派遣、人格面具功能等！ ・・・ 如您想在購買前體驗遊戲氛圍，前作《ナイト・アンド・ドラゴン：王国の騎士》可以免費遊玩，請務必試玩一下。 官方網站 http://dgjam.com/knightdragon3

应用截屏

iPhone

entry.title: Delil Zinciri
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$30.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $60.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買

  • Büyük Altın Sandığı：$60.00
  • Orta Altın Sandığı：$30.00
  • Mega Altın Hazinesi：$150.00
  • Küçük Altın Çantası：$30.00

应用描述

Gerçekler karanlıkta kalmaz… İstanbul’un sokakları, tarihi yapıları ve karanlık sırları arasında geçen bu dedektiflik bulmacasında, her bölüm yeni bir vakayı çözmek için seni bekliyor. Delil Zinciri, bölüm bölüm ilerleyen, şüphelileri sorguladığın ve kanıtları bir araya getirerek gizemi çözdüğün sürükleyici bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Oyunun kalbinde kart temelli sorgulama sistemi bulunuyor: Tanıkları çapraz sorguya al, Arşivleri tarayarak bilgi topla, Özel araçlar ile izleri bul, Şüphelilerin tutarsız ifadelerini ortaya çıkar! Her bölüm İstanbul’un farklı bir semtinde geçiyor: Galata’nın dar sokaklarından, Kadıköy’deki eski bir sahaf dükkanına kadar birçok farklı ve gizemli mekânda, yeni ipuçları seni bekliyor...

entry.title: FRAMED 2 - 致命框架 2
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $120.00 [$120.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$120.00

应用描述

多年前，一艘神秘的船隻悄悄將珍貴的貨物走私到異國。  《FRAMED》系列作的獨立篇章。 改變順序，扭轉結局。 《FRAMED 2》是一款黑色調益智遊戲，玩家可以調動播放動畫的漫畫格子順序，改變故事結局。 《FRAMED》是小島秀夫心目中的 2014 年最佳遊戲，而續作《FRAMED 2》的場景則回到第一代遊戲事件發生之前。 《FRAMED 2》專為 iPhone、iPad 和 iPod Touch iOS 9.0 以上版本設計。 已為 iPhone 5 以上和 iPad Air 以上版本進行優化。 LoveShack Entertainment 為澳洲的獨立遊戲開發商。 www.loveshackentertainment.com 歡迎追蹤 @LoveShackers，別錯過更新消息和新遊戲快訊。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$430.00 → $190.00 [$190.00 ~ $430.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$190.00

应用描述

[Warning] Please Read Before Purchasing No refunds (including exchanges for other products, services, etc.) are available after purchase, regardless of the reason. Please ensure that your device is compatible via the app's Contact page (link below). https://bnfaq.channel.or.jp/title/3152 You are purchasing a license for digital goods. For full terms and conditions, please see the License Agreement below. [Game Summary] A Naruto game full of 3D competitive action! NARUTO: Ultimate Ninja STORM finally makes its way to smartphones! Experience the stories and battles of Naruto's childhood through beautiful graphics! Game Content Ultimate Mission Mode Relive the stories and famous battles from Naruto's childhood! You can freely move around the Hidden Leaf Village and take on missions and mini games! Free Battle Mode In Free Battle Mode, you can choose from 25 unique characters from Naruto's childhood and 10 support characters to enjoy a variety of powerful ninjutsu actions and battles! Changes for the App Easily activate ninjutsu, ultimate jutsu, and other actions with a tap! Even those playing the series for the first time can confidently enjoy the game! Plus, the following additional features and improvements have made the game easier to play: - New auto-save feature - New control mode selection for battle (casual/manual) - New battle assist feature (casual only) - Improved controls for battle and free movement - New retry feature for missions - Improved mini-game UI - Improved tutorial Play Notes - This game contains violent content. - Please pay attention to how long you play and avoid excessive gameplay. - 本遊戲部份內容涉及暴力情節 - 請注意遊戲時間,避免沉迷 [Number of Players] This is a single-player game only. [Storage] To download this app, you will need at least 3.5 GB of free space. When downloading, please ensure you have a strong internet connection and/or Wi-Fi environment. *Depending on your device, you may need more than the suggested storage amount. [Online] - There is no online battle mode. - Aside from the initial game download, you can play offline. - An internet connection is required to back up and transfer game data. Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc. Website: https://bandainamcoent.co.jp/english/ By downloading or installing this app, you agree to the Bandai Namco Entertainment Terms of Service. entry.title: Religion inc.上帝模擬器
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$150.00 → $10.00 [$10.00 ~ $150.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$10.00

应用描述

你正在閱讀這段文字。 但為何？ 你是在尋找一款遊戲， 還是遊戲已找到你？ 《宗教公司》不僅僅是一款策略遊戲。 它是創造新現實的模擬。 你會塑造信仰， 還是信仰會塑造你？ 人類一直在黑暗中尋找光明。 一直渴望相信一些更偉大的事物， 那些賦予存在意義的東西。 這就是宗教誕生的原因—— 作為歷史風暴中的燈塔， 作為生命海洋中的指南針。 如果你成為一個宗教的創造者會怎樣？ 如果你可以建立自己的信仰、自己的真理、自己的現實呢？ 你是創造者。 你是源頭。 你是靈感。 如果你在閱讀這段文字——你已經在遊戲中！ 剩下的就是安裝——並享受創造宗教的過程與模擬！ 成為信仰的源泉——在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中。 人類一直感受到相信比自己更偉大的事物的需求。在歷史長河中，人們一直在尋找能引導他們穿越黑暗的光。對數百萬人來說，那光成為信仰。宗教成為燈塔，幫助許多人在這個世界找到意義，經受變革的風暴，並找到通往幸福的道路。 世界上有許多宗教，每一種都受到其時代與挑戰的塑造。但這個過程還能如何發展？人類的信仰又可能呈現出哪些迷人而多樣的形式？答案就在我們的新遊戲中！創建你獨一無二的宗教，經歷時間的考驗，看看它是否能引領人類走向團結。 遊戲特色 * 多樣的宗教原型，具有獨特的文化價值與傳統！ * 通過遊戲解鎖所有原型：一神教、靈性主義、萬神殿、薩滿教、異教等！ * 你的追隨者會成為狂熱的信徒還是達到更高的覺悟？選擇在你！ * 數百個現實世界的宗教元素——未來還有更多！了解更多世界宗教！ * 每個原型都具有獨特的主動能力——行奇蹟，改變世界！ * 放鬆的遊戲玩法，非常適合晚上休息時：用簡單的點擊收集信仰點，探索各種宗教元素。按照自己的節奏遊玩，享受其中！ 在策略模擬器《宗教公司》中，通過結合不同的宗教元素，創建你獨一無二的宗教。 願和平與愛與所有兄弟姐妹同在！

entry.title: Eco inc.
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$250.00 → $10.00 [$10.00 ~ $250.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$10.00

App 內購買

  • +100 boosters ECO-Initiative!：$10.00
  • +2026 boosters ECO-Initiative!：$150.00
  • +444! Triple-Four Booster Pack：$90.00

应用描述

A game about positive impact on nature and eco-friendly living. Ecology strategy games where you reconnect with nature and create a green world for future civilizations. Take on the role of a planet protection fund and stabilize its environmental situation. Join the global movement to save the planet Earth! About game ECO inc. Save The Earth: * Take on the role of a planet protection fund and develop environmental initiatives. * Various game mechanics: from resource management to diplomacy. * Complex tasks and unexpected events that will test your strategic thinking. * An opportunity to make a real contribution to saving the planet by raising awareness of environmental issues. *Global Challenges: Climate change, environmental pollution, resource depletion - all these challenges require your solution. Don't let the environmental catastrophe spread like a "plague" across the planet Earth. *Strategic Planning: Develop long-term plans, consider all factors, and make fateful decisions that will determine the future of the Earth. *Economic Development: Manage resources, invest in new technologies and build a green future world. *Volunteering: Send your heroes to help those in need, participate in international projects and fight for a clean planet. * Education: Raise your eco-awareness, study real problems and find ways to solve them. How to play the planet saving game tutorial guide: The player's goal is to stabilize the environmental situation on the entire planet at an early stage. Then, step by step, restore and improve the eco-situation of the Earth. Yeah, it's an epic quest ;) At the end of the game, you will receive statistics on how successful your mission was. Each step leads to different consequences, you will need to take thoughtful and quick actions. Useful information: Green Days: Eco Calendar — your personal guide to the planet’s most important environmental events! Follow Earth Days, Forest Days, Ocean Days, and Biodiversity Days. Plan your eco-actions and help make the world greener! List of Global Green Holidays: February 2 — World Wetlands Day March 3 — World Wildlife Day March 21 — International Day of Forests March 22 — World Water Day March 23 — World Meteorological Day April 7 — World Health Day (eco-focus) April 22 — Earth Day May 22 — International Day for Biological Diversity June 5 — World Environment Day June 8 — World Oceans Day June 17 — World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought July 28 — World Nature Conservation Day September 16 — International Day for the Preservation of the Ozone Layer October 4 — World Animal Day October 13 — International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction November 6 — International Day for Preventing the Exploitation of the Environment in War and Armed Conflict December 11 — International Mountain Day Join millions of eco heroes around the world and become part of the global movement to save the planet! :)
